video.title: Parenthood
video.synopsis: Four grown siblings juggle parenthood, relationships, careers and more as they cope with life's ups and downs in this drama set in Berkeley, Calif.

episodes.synopsis: Single mother Sarah and her two children, Amber and Drew, are moving back home with her parents Zeek and Camille.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Kristina come to terms with the fact that their son may have Asperger's Syndrome. Sarah is on the job hunt and Zeek pushes her to dream big.
episodes.title: Man Versus Possum

episodes.synopsis: After Max gets kicked out of school, Adam and Kristina explore educational options for their son. Sarah hits a wall when she ends things with Jim.
episodes.title: The Deep End of the Pool

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Kristina use questionable tactics to find out about Haddie's secret relationship. Sarah doesn't know how to talk to Drew.
episodes.title: Whassup

episodes.synopsis: When Max rejoins the baseball team, Drew helps Adam connect with his son. Sarah strikes up a friendship with Amber's English teacher, Mr. Cyr.
episodes.title: The Situation

episodes.synopsis: Kristina's constant worrying affects her and Adam's sex life, and the worrying only gets worse when Max starts working with a young behavioral aide.
episodes.title: The Big 'O'

episodes.synopsis: Adam wants to spend time with his family but has trouble juggling their multiple schedules, especially while Gaby continues to work with Max.
episodes.title: What's Goin' On Down There?

episodes.synopsis: The Braverman family is on high alert when Amber's ex-boyfriend Damien arrives from Fresno. Zeek takes Adam on a road trip for investment advice.
episodes.title: Rubber Band Ball

episodes.synopsis: Adam has his hands full when Kristina goes back to work and leaves him with Max and Haddie for the weekend.
episodes.title: Perchance to Dream

episodes.synopsis: When Crosby and Jasmine's relationship heats up, they have to decide how to explain it to Jabbar. Elsewhere, Adam and Kristina search for friends.
episodes.title: Namaste No More

episodes.synopsis: Zeek makes his presence known while crashing with Adam and Kristina. Elsewhere, Camille focuses on her art instead of focusing on her husband.
episodes.title: Solace

episodes.synopsis: A family walk for autism is jeopardized when Sarah and Adam disagree over their daughters' behavior. Haddie and Amber's secret anger comes to a head.
episodes.title: Team Braverman

episodes.synopsis: Tensions run high for Sarah and Amber, leading Sarah to meet with Mr. Cyr to discuss her complex daughter. Zeek tries to win back Camille's heart.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: Adam is overwhelmed by family needs and increasing demands at work from his boss. Zeek is overly confident in his skills as he tries to fix a leak.
episodes.title: I Hear You, I See You

episodes.synopsis: Adam offers an internship position to Sarah at T&S Footwear. Meanwhile, Kristina helps Suze Lessing through her divorce by babysitting Noel.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: Amber starts spending a lot of time with a new friend, Kelsey, which makes Sarah jealous. Sarah's coworker, Mike, gives her advice on the situation.
episodes.title: I'm Cooler than You Think

episodes.synopsis: Kristina learns alarming stats about the divorce rate of parents with autistic kids and schedules a date night with Adam to keep their marriage alive.
episodes.title: Date Night

episodes.synopsis: Kristina goes to an Asperger's support group and tries to convince Adam to join her. Crosby and Jasmine try to get Jabbar accepted at Sydney's school.
episodes.title: The Booth Job

episodes.synopsis: Zeek once again tries to go overboard with the Halloween celebration and is upset when Haddie, Amber and Drew refuse to join in the fun.
episodes.title: Orange Alert

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of a financial crisis, Adam makes a decision that alters the company 's future. Jasmine and Crosby announce their future plans to Jabbar.
episodes.title: Seven Names

episodes.synopsis: Adam confronts a man in defense of Max. Crosby and Jasmine delve into domestic discussions, beginning with the selling of Crosby's boat.
episodes.title: If This Boat Is a Rockin'

episodes.synopsis: Sarah convinces Amber to meet with an important colleague of Gordon's. Meanwhile, Kristina frantically attempts to obtain a birthday invite for Max.
episodes.title: Put Yourself Out There

episodes.synopsis: Adam's torn between his job and family after surprising news from Gordon. While making Thanksgiving dinner, Camille and Amber share a bonding moment.
episodes.title: Happy Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Crosby has trouble teaching Jabbar to clean his room. Meanwhile, Zeek finds Drew drinking beer with guys from school.
episodes.title: Damage Control

episodes.synopsis: Adam tries to cope with the idea of a new boss and is concerned about the stability of his job. Kristina tries winning Haddie over.
episodes.title: Meet the New Boss

episodes.synopsis: Kristina and Adam catch Haddie sneaking around with Alex and forbid her from seeing him anymore.
episodes.title: Opening Night

episodes.synopsis: Kristina refuses to accept Haddie's relationship with Alex, causing her to move in with her grandparents. Sarah puts her foot down at work.
episodes.title: A House Divided

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Adam discuss a situation with Haddie. Haddie, Amber and Max run into Alex. Crosby and Jasmine meet a reverend for pre-marital counseling.
episodes.title: Just Go Home

episodes.synopsis: Kristina and Adam throw Max a birthday party, hosted by Amazing Andy, a man who lives with Aspergers.
episodes.title: Amazing Andy and His Wonderful World of Bugs

episodes.synopsis: Crosby pays the price for a mistake that will change his relationships with those closest to him. Adam gets annoyed with Alex's frequent visits.
episodes.title: Do Not Sleep With Your Autistic Nephew's Therapist

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Kristina find it difficult to talk to Max about his Asperger's Syndrome and come to Dr. Pelickan for guidance.
episodes.title: Qualities and Difficulties

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Kristina have an unexpected meeting with the principal of Max's school. Jabbar is selected "Star of the Week" by his elementary school.
episodes.title: Taking the Leap

episodes.synopsis: Crosby does everything he can to get Jasmine back. Adam is nervous about Haddie going to prom with Alex as Julia tries to spend more time with Sydney.
episodes.title: New Plan

episodes.synopsis: Amber quits her job and begins to fall down a dangerous and destructive path. Crosby works with Joel to mend his relationship with Jasmine.
episodes.title: Slipping Away

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and the rest of the Braverman family worry about Amber's well-being after an accident. Meanwhile, Max 's behavior upsets Adam.
episodes.title: Hard Times Come Again No More

episodes.synopsis: Sarah Braverman celebrates her 40th birthday as Amber strives for independence; Adam feels pressure to support his growing family and Julia struggles to adopt.
episodes.title: I Don't Want to Do This Without You

episodes.synopsis: Kristina is concerned over Max's well-being as he attends a mainstream public school. Sarah and Mark Cyr define and grow their relationship.
episodes.title: Hey, If You're Not Using That Baby

episodes.synopsis: Amber revels in her new independence while Sarah strives to remain a part of her life. Crosby is unsure how he feels about Jasmine dating.
episodes.title: Step Right Up

episodes.synopsis: Zeek lands his first commercial, prompting Camille to reflect on her own achievements. Sarah and Mark take their friendship to a new level.
episodes.title: Clear Skies From Here On Out

episodes.synopsis: Kristina is rushed to the hospital by an unlikely accomplice, while Julia and Joel receive positive news on a possible addition to their family.
episodes.title: Nora

episodes.synopsis: Kristina exhausts herself by diving back into supermom mode, while Adam and Crosby prepare their new music studio in hopes of impressing a client.
episodes.title: Tales From the Luncheonette

episodes.synopsis: Kristina tries to bring the family together for a night of fun, but things don't go quite as planned.
episodes.title: Forced Family Fun

episodes.synopsis: After offering to let Seth stay with her once he's released from rehab, Amber begins to understand what Sarah has been going through all these years.
episodes.title: In-Between

episodes.synopsis: During an intense game of Braverman charades, Joel and Julia come to the realization they may have spoiled Sydney.
episodes.title: Sore Loser

episodes.synopsis: An inappropriate moment at work disrupts Adam and Kristina's marriage. A meeting with Zoe's boyfriend may jeopardize Julia and Joel's adoption plan.
episodes.title: Mr. Honesty

episodes.synopsis: Kristina and Adam become overwhelmed with their work schedules and put Max's well-being in danger. Kristina offers Amber a new opportunity.
episodes.title: Missing

episodes.synopsis: Seeking his mother's approval, Zeek demands the entire family caravan on a road trip, where they encounter many roadblocks along the way.
episodes.title: Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Crosby is frustrated when Adam becomes the focus of a local newspaper's piece on the Luncheonette. Amber struggles to find her place in a new job.
episodes.title: Just Smile

episodes.synopsis: Jasmine becomes uncomfortable as the relationship between Crosby and Lily grows. Zoe begins to realize the seriousness of her decision.
episodes.title: It Is What It Is

episodes.synopsis: Mark invites Sarah to a friend's engagement party, which stirs up a serious conversation about a baby in their future. Amber gets a job promotion.
episodes.title: Politics

episodes.synopsis: Julia tries to avoid getting too involved in Zoe's life. Sarah and Mark's plan to have a baby elicits an unexpected reaction from Drew.
episodes.title: Tough Love

episodes.synopsis: Julia heads to the hospital for the birth of her and Joel's son. Sarah considers the possibility of a new life in New York with Mark.
episodes.title: Remember Me, I'm the One Who Loves You

episodes.synopsis: The Bravermans come together to celebrate a momentous event, while Julia and Joel strive to overcome the emotional roller coaster of adopting a child.
episodes.title: My Brother's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: A planned family portrait documents a new chapter for the Bravermans.
episodes.title: Family Portrait

episodes.synopsis: Victor learns to be a Braverman and Kristina's world is suddenly altered.
episodes.title: Left Field

episodes.synopsis: Kristina is torn apart after receiving emotional news while Zeek's behavior worries his children. Max struggles in a new environment.
episodes.title: Everything Is Not Okay

episodes.synopsis: Jasmine and Crosby explain an emotional lesson to Jabbar while Kristina learns to accept a new normal; Joel puts his faith in Victor while he tries out a new activity and Sarah begins to see sensitivities in her new boss.
episodes.title: The Talk

episodes.synopsis: Kristina shares heavy, emotional news with the family; Julia makes a life changing decision while Joel supports Victor in a new activity; Sarah experiences an awkward moment at work.
episodes.title: There's Something I Need to Tell You...

episodes.synopsis: Kristina heads into surgery as the Bravermans lend their support.
episodes.title: I'll Be Right Here

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Kristina face challenges as she recovers from surgery and prepares for the next phase of her treatment; Amber and Ryan's relationship develops causing concerns for Sarah and Zeek.
episodes.title: Together

episodes.synopsis: A weekend full of activity unfolds for the Bravermans as party planning, road trips, and parenting dilemmas provide the family with some unexpected experiences.
episodes.title: One More Weekend With You

episodes.synopsis: Julia struggles with her recent career decision while Joel contemplates his future. Meanwhile, Sarah is forced to make a difficult choice affecting her personal and professional life.
episodes.title: You Can't Always Get What You Want

episodes.synopsis: Sarah deepens her involvement with Hank, further straining her relationship with Mark. Julia experiments with new techniques to alleviate Victor's frustration with school. Meanwhile, Amber helps Ryan secure a job working on Joel's construction crew.
episodes.title: Trouble in Candyland

episodes.synopsis: Christmas with the Bravermans brings the family closer together.
episodes.title: What to My Wondering Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Jasmine and Crosby contemplate the future of their family as they welcome a new roommate. Kristina and Adam go on a much needed date night after she makes a drastic change to her appearance. Ray Romano and Tina Lifford guest star.
episodes.title: Keep on Rowing

episodes.synopsis: Drew and Amy receive overwhelming news. Adam and Kristina help Max adjust to teenage life. Meanwhile, Victor presents new challenges for Julia and Joel.
episodes.title: Small Victories

episodes.synopsis: Julia and Joel struggle with a difficult decision involving Victor. Crosby and Jasmine are frustrated with Renee, causing tension in the house. Meanwhile, Kristina helps Max fight for a cause that he is passionate about.
episodes.title: One Step Forward, Two Steps Back

episodes.synopsis: Jasmine and Crosby celebrate their anniversary and receive exciting news while Julia and Joel plan a family event.
episodes.title: Because You're My Sister

episodes.synopsis: A healthy Kristina makes a momentous decision about her future, while Crosby struggles to bond with his daughter and Hank becomes friends with Max.
episodes.title: It Has to Be Now

episodes.synopsis: Amber and Ryan share their good news. Zeek refuses to discuss the future with Camille, and Adam struggles with Kristina's decision to run for mayor.
episodes.title: All Aboard Who's Coming Aboard

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Kristina agree on her campaign finances while Joel and Julia argue over Victor's future. Crosby and Jasmine have a breakthrough with Aida.
episodes.title: Nipple Confusion

episodes.synopsis: Zeek takes a unique approach to Victor's problems, and Drew tries to be more than a friend to Natalie. Sarah clashes with Amber over the wedding.
episodes.title: In Dreams Begin Responsibilities

episodes.synopsis: Boundary issues frustrate the Braverman clan as Victor gets into trouble at school, and Crosby and Adam attempt to launch their own record label.
episodes.title: Let's Be Mad Together

episodes.synopsis: The Bravermans need to rely on their wits as Kristina prepares for a debate, Sarah apologizes to Amber, and Camille makes an important announcement.
episodes.title: The M Word

episodes.synopsis: Max learns some interesting tidbits about Sarah's past. Camille embarks on her trip, while Julia finds herself turning to Ed more often for comfort.
episodes.title: Speaking of Baggage

episodes.synopsis: Future possibilities weigh heavily on the Bravermans as Kristina decides how to conduct her campaign and Julie breaks bad news to Victor about school.
episodes.title: The Ring

episodes.synopsis: Tensions abound as Election Day arrives, Julia and Joel continue to wrangle over Victor, and Ryan lashes out when he feels that Amber is ignoring him.
episodes.title: Election Day

episodes.synopsis: Julia is torn between Joel and Ed, Adam helps Kristina deal with her disappointment and Ryan makes a big decision that affects his future with Amber.
episodes.title: All That's Left Is the Hugging

episodes.synopsis: Relationships are tested as Joel questions Julia's fidelity, Camille extends her vacation and Max has a violent episode in Hank's photography studio.
episodes.title: Promises

episodes.synopsis: Work and personal lives intertwine as Carl persuades Sarah to bid for a big job, and Crosby invites a struggling Oliver to stay with him and Jasmine.
episodes.title: Stay a Little Longer

episodes.synopsis: The Bravermans look for answers as Amber turns to a surprising source for comfort; Hank seeks a diagnosis and Camille informs Zeek of her new plans.
episodes.title: Jump Ball

episodes.synopsis: Zeek finally gives in to Camille's desire to sell the house, but it becomes a moot point when several Bravermen children are forced to move back home.
episodes.title: You've Got Mold

episodes.synopsis: The Bravermans draw comfort from one another when Julia faces a weekend alone, Adam and Kristina rejuvenate their marriage, and Drew breaks with Amy.
episodes.title: Just Like at Home

episodes.synopsis: Sarah gets good advice from an unlikely source, while Crosby battles with Camille over her desire to sell the family home and Amber takes Drew out.
episodes.title: The Enchanting Mr. Knight

episodes.synopsis: Tension runs high when Jasmine's mom insists that baby Aida must be christened, which leads to complications involving parties, godparents and faith.
episodes.title: Limbo

episodes.synopsis: There's trouble for the younger members of the family as Victor and Sydney struggle with their parents' separation, and Max goes on a field trip.
episodes.title: The Offer

episodes.synopsis: Fathers and sons come together as Adam tries to boost Max's morale while Crosby and Zeek go on a road trip that has beneficial consequences for all.
episodes.title: Fraud Alert

episodes.synopsis: Change is the name of the game as Julia makes several bold decisions, Zeek and Camille sell the house, and Hank wrestles with expressing his emotions.
episodes.title: Cold Feet

episodes.synopsis: Joel helps Crosby with home repairs while Kristina and Adam make progress on their school. Amber receives bad news, but Hank is there to stand by her.
episodes.title: I'm Still Here

episodes.synopsis: Love is in the air as Haddie arrives home with big news, Sarah answers Hank's request to renew their relationship and Drew pursues Natalie to Oregon.
episodes.title: The Pontiac
